import React from 'react' import logo from "./images/logo.png"; import FileBase64 from "react-file-base64"; import { useEffect } from "react"; //a hook that GIVES "side-effects" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; // allows us to access our path / route history. import Axios from "axios"; //allows us to make GET and POST requests from the browser. import { useState } from "react"; //HERE we import useState Hook so we can add state to our functional components. function Register() { const [item, setItem] = useState(""); const [prevPage, setprevPage] = useState(false); const [nexPage, setnexPage] = useState(true); const [verifyEmail, setVerifyEmail] = useState(true); function nextPage(e){ e.preventDefault(); setprevPage(true) setnexPage(false) } function createAccount(){ if(item==""){ alert("Upload your NID") }else{ setnexPage(true) setVerifyEmail(false) } } return (
